title: Silent PayBack: A city on edge... a detective on shaky ground...
description: A serial killer roams the streets of Brighton, hunting for his next victim. When the case lands on detective David Mallory's desk, will his personal demon prevent him from bringing this vicious monster to justice? As the body count rises, Mallory finds himself sinking under the weight of his heavy secret - one that could jeopardise his job and his reputation. With the pressure building, can the troubled detective reconcile his issues and solve the case before more women die?
author: Jaye Marie
